sentences.en: Artillery fire supported the infantry attack.

sentences.cn: 我认识的人要么在骑兵队,要么是步兵.

sentences.en: He saw service as an infantry officer.

sentences.cn: 他签署了志愿书要在步兵服役九年.

sentences.en: Our infantry was protected by a curtain of artillery fire.
sentences.cn: 我们的步兵在炮兵火力掩护之下.

sentences.en: The artillery has more firepower than the infantry.

sentences.cn: 步兵团受到火力攻击时比利时人向后撤退。

sentences.en: The infantry divisions mopped up remaining centres of resistance.
sentences.cn: 陆军各师肃清了残余的抵抗据点。

sentences.en: The infantry were advancing to attack the ridge.
sentences.cn: 步兵部队正在向前挺进攻打山脊。

sentences.en: The infantry were equipped with flame throwers.

sentences.cn: 步兵团可能会使用打了就跑的战术来阻滞进攻部队。

sentences.en: The transport corps is ancillary to the infantry.
sentences.cn: 运输队是步兵的辅助部队.

sentences.en: We have less infantry than the enemy.
